entry.title: [Lux & Umbra] Featured Weapon Convene
entry.content:
During the event, 5-Star Weapon: Lux & Umbra, 4-Star Weapons: Hollow Mirage, Jinzhou Keeper, and Overture receive boosted drop rates!

Duration

2026-02-26 10:00 - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)

Eligibility

  • Reach Union Level 5.

  • Or complete the combat trial in First Resonance.

  • Or access Main Quest Fast Track Event and proceed with the Main Quest until you reach a certain point.

Convene Rules

  • [Absolute Pulsation] is a Featured Weapon Convene event banner.

  • Use Forging Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.

  • The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Weapon Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Weapon is obtained.

  • The 5-Star Weapon you Convene is guaranteed to be Lux & Umbra.

  • Featured Weapon Lux & Umbra is exclusive to the Featured Weapon Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

For more details, please refer to the in-game Convene page.

entry.title: [From Ashes] Featured Resonator Convene
entry.content:
During the event, 5-Star Resonator: Galbrena, 4-Star Resonators: Sanhua, Lumi, and Yuanwu receive boosted drop rates!

Duration

2026-02-26 10:00 - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)

Eligibility

  • Reach Union Level 5.

  • Or complete the combat trial in First Resonance.

  • Or access Main Quest Fast Track Event and proceed with the Main Quest until you reach a certain point.

Convene Rules

  • [From Ashes] is a Featured Resonator Convene event banner. Use Radiant Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.

  • The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Resonator Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Resonator is obtained.

  • Featured Resonator Galbrena is exclusive to the [From Ashes] Featured Resonator Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

  • Featured Resonator Galbrena's Waveband will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store with a limit of 2 purchases, and it will be removed once the Convene event ends.

  • During the event, all the Resonators who receive boosted drop rates will become available in Ascendant Aces as Trial Resonators. Complete their Ascendant Aces challenges to obtain rewards.

For more details, please refer to the in-game Convene page.

entry.title: Resonator Review | Infernal Descent—Galbrena
entry.content:
Resonator Review | Infernal Descent—Galbrena

Cold and decisive, she is the "Discord Slayer" who hunts across Solaris and the same "Fiend of Ever-burning Flame" spoken of in whispers. Now, she serves as a Black Shores Consultant, active across the world.

entry.title: Upcoming Events in Wuthering Waves Version 3.1
Profile Reveal | Phase Transition — Luuk Herssen
entry.content:
Loading Data>>>

Luuk Herssen

The attending physician of Startorch Academy's Resonator Nursing Unit, renowned for his keen intellect and unshakable composure. Rumor has it nobody has ever seen him lose control.

He is a keen listener adept at dissecting the shadows in a person's heart. From the unhealing wound on his hand, golden blood seeps, a substance he can summon to become a blade of utmost precision.

entry.title: Post-Lament Anthropocene: Stars Intertwined | Luuk Herssen
entry.content: "Dr. Luuk Herssen, from the Resonator Nursing Unit. A rare exception that we meet outside my office. Oh, you can just call me Luuk."— Luuk Herssen

entry.title: Post-Lament Anthropocene: Enemies — Sigillum
entry.content:
Rage and tears. Suffering and joy. Sorrow and pain. All are condensed, along with her sigh, into a single golden frequency.

It gazes at the sky, lost in memories worn thin by the ages. The lost voyager is still searching for the way home.

entry.title: Post-Lament Anthropocene: Enemies — Nameless Explorer
entry.content: The station fell like a dying star, burying the dream of its era beneath ice and soil. The Explorer was one of those who dreamed, who once walked among the stars. But now he hides in the dark, corrupted by the Void. Before reason and strength slipped entirely from his grasp, he sealed himself away in the cabin.

entry.title: Wutherium Geographic: Lands and Waters — Roya Frostlands: Frostlands Surface
entry.content: Perched above Lahai-Roi, the Roya Frostlands Surface was once a sprawling forest hugging the narrow bay, a lifeline for the wandering Roya Tribe. Everything changed with the first Lament, which crowned the Frostlands as Solaris's new pole and froze the land into a boundless sheet of ice. The Lament's magnetic chaos dragged the near-orbit satellites and a space station from the sky, scattering their wreckage across the expanse.

entry.title: [Where Stars Cascade Down] Limited-Time Event, Coming Soon!
entry.content:
[Where Stars Cascade Down] Limited-Time Event, Coming Soon!

Duration

2026-02-15 04:00 - 2026-03-18 11:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x800, Sigil: A Night to Remember, Phantom: Sigillum, Premium Tuner, Modifier, Forgery Premium Supply - Lahai-Roi, Premium Enclosure Tank - Lahai-Roi, Shell Credit, and other Materials.

entry.title: [Bountiful Crescendo] Limited-Time Material Double Drop Event
entry.content:
The Sonoro Spheres are undergoing an accelerating collapse due to the Waveworn Phenomenon. However, this is also intensifying the energy within, resulting in more valuable materials.

Use the Waveplates to maximize your rewards from the Remnant Crystals.

Duration

2026-02-19 04:00 - 2026-02-26 03:59 (server time)

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14.

Details

  • Complete Simulation Challenge and Forgery Challenges during the event and spend Waveplates for double rewards.

  • Simulation Challenge and Forgery Challenge share the double rewards claims.

  • During [Bountiful Crescendo], you can claim double rewards 3 times a day, and the remaining double rewards claims can be viewed on the [Bountiful Crescendo] event page.

  • During [Bountiful Crescendo], double rewards claims refresh daily at 04:00 (server time).

entry.title: [Rein Back! Migration Mayhem!] Leisure Event
entry.content:
A team of Royan herders has run into trouble while guiding their Exoswarm across the frostlands. Now, they need your help to track down the strays.

Duration

2026-02-19 04:00 - 2026-03-09 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x400, Premium Resonance Potion x9, Premium Energy Core x6, Premium Sealed Tube x6, Forgery Advanced Supply - Lahai-Roi x18, Advanced Enclosure Tank Lahai-Roi x36, Shell Credit x240000

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14 and unlock the Resonance Nexus of the Startorch Academy during Main Quest Chapter III Act I ""What Burns Beneath Frostlands"" to unlock.

Event Rules

  • During the event, ""Migration Mayhem,"" stages unlock daily, featuring both Easy and Hard difficulty modes. The Easy and Hard difficulties each include 1 and 2 lost Exoswarm respectively.

  • During the challenge, players and Exoswarm take turns to move: Place the Royan herder's herding staff on the frostlands as obstacles, use various terrain conditions such as sinkholes and ice walls, etc., to restrict the Exoswarm's movement and surround them, and ultimately guide the lost Exoswarm back to the migration pack.

  • Completely surround the Exoswarm to complete the stage.

entry.title: Unsigned Good Wishes

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 2.

Rules

  • The rewards will be issued to your in-game mailbox in stages, on the dates specified above.

  • During the event, reach Union Level 2 and unlock the Mail feature to unlock the rewards. The rewards will remain claimable via in-game mail until the next version update maintenance. Don't forget to claim them.

entry.title: V3.1 WUWA Discord Quest Livestream Event Begins!
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

V3.1 WUWA Discord Quest Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the streaming quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards, including Astrite!

https://discord.com/quests/1466549730191343881

Event Duration

2026/02/05 ~ 2026/02/11 (PT)

Rewards

Shell Credit* 20,000

Advanced Resonance Potion* 3

Advanced Energy Core* 3

Astrite* 30

Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the streaming quest. The Redemption Code will expire on 2026/05/04 at 8:59 (PT). The reward will be limited to one reward redemption per account.

Who is Eligible

Available to players on PC where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available. Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.

Other Terms

Limit of one reward redemption per account. For more information on Discord Quests, please visit Discord Quest Help Center.

How to Participate

In order to successfully complete the V3.1 WUWA Discord Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play the game for 15 minutes. You must be logged into the Discord desktop app to track your progress.

Redemption Instructions

  1. Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to our Discord Quests FAQ.

  2. Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].

  3. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.

  4. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

  5. The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2026/05/04 at 08:59 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.

Discord Quest FAQ

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.

For more information on Discord Quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.

Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.

A: We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.

However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.

Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "For You Who Walk in Snow" is now live!
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "For You Who Walk in Snow" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 17 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more! Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!

Proceed to submit: <https://forms.gle/LgDgdmUU3TzABV5Y7>

Content Requirement

Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 3.1 "For You Who Walk in Snow"!

Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!

How to Submit

  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.

  2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.

  • Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.

Submission form: <https://forms.gle/LgDgdmUU3TzABV5Y7>

Submission Period

2026/2/5 - 2026/3/8 (PT)

Rewards

1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 17 Pro 512GB

2nd Place (5 Winners): 6,000 Astrites & 800 USD

3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD

4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD

5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & $50 Amazon Gift Card

Lucky Prize (20 Winners): $20 Amazon Gift Card

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

  1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart in your post and fill out the submission form.

  2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

  3. You can submit multiple entries and win multiple rewards. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

  4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works previously entered into other fan creation events

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

  1. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

  2. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

  3. By participating in the event, you grant KURO GAMES the right to freely republish your submitted content on the internet and social media platforms, with appropriate credit given to the creator. No additional notice will be provided prior to publication.

  4. This event is available solely to participants on the designated servers listed below: America, Europe, Asia, SEA, HMT(HK,MO,TW).

entry.title: [Full Throttle! Bolt & Blitz!] Leisure Event
entry.content:
To help Startorch freshmen learn to drive safely, the Biological Mechanical Exoswarm Materials Manufacturing and Research Club developed H.E.R.M.E.S., a motorbike simulator running on heuristic algorithms. But due to some issues with the model's training data, the system accidentally became sentient and refused to be driven. In their last-ditch effort, the developer reached out to you for help with the testing.

Duration

2026-02-07 04:00 - 2026-03-18 03:59 (server time)

Rewards

Astrite x600, Roving Lodestar (Title) x1, Premium Enclosure Tank - Lahai-Roi x16, Forgery Premium Supply - Lahai-Roi x8, Shell Credit x330000, and other Materials.

Eligibility

Reach Union Level 14 and obtain the expedition motorbike to unlock.

Event Rules

  • Select a Resonator to challenge the tracks with H.E.R.M.E.S. with an arsenal of new weapons. Use enhancement modules to boost the stats of H.E.R.M.E.S. and upgrade their weapons. Complete all tracks to finalize the testing.

  • After the event ends, if you have any claimable rewards that were not claimed, these rewards will be reissued via in-game Mail the next time you log in to the game within 30 days after the event ends.

entry.title: V3.1 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,

The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Content Requirement

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.

We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

How to Submit

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

Submission Period

2026/02/05 - 2026/03/05 (PT)

Judging Criteria

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

Notes

To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.

Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.

Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:

  • Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves

  • Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

  • Works submitted outside the event period

  • Works created with the assistance of AI technology

  • Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism

  • Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

  • Works deemed inappropriate by the judges

Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.
